Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires inter-agency records prepared by an outside consultant at the behest of an agency to be subject to FOIL disclosure
Summary: Requires inter-agency records prepared by an outside consultant at the behest of an agency to be subject to FOIL disclosure.
LawCode: Amd ยง87, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to requiring inter-agency records prepared by an outside consultant at the behest of an agency to be subject to FOIL disclosure
